verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
'Til the storm passes over, 'til the thunder sounds no more,
'Til the clouds roll forever from the sky,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Hold me fast; let me stand in the hollow of Thy hand.
Keep me safe 'til the storm passes by

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
In the dark of the midnight have I oft hid my face
While the storms howl above me, and there's no hiding place.

verse.name: v1b
v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
But I know Thou art with me, and tomorrow I'll rise
Where the storms never darken the skies.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
When the long night has ended and the storms come no more,
Let me stand in Thy presence on that bright, peaceful shore.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
In that land where the tempest never comes,
Lord, may I dwell with Thee,
when the storm passes by.
